rules.natural: Provided that the worker has a disease, the worker makes a full recovery.
If the worker has modified duties, then the worker returns to work.
Under the condition that the company provides workplace accommodation, if the worker consumes alcohol, then the worker does not perform their job.
Provided that the company makes a reasonable adjustment, the company provides workplace accommodation.
Whenever the company complies with legal requirements, the company makes a reasonable adjustment.
If the union provides support, then the company complies with legal requirements.
Under the condition that management provides support, the company complies with legal requirements.
Provided that the union engages in collective bargaining, the union provides support.
The union engages in collective bargaining or the company changes its policy.
If the company changes its policy, then management provides support.
Either the worker is diagnosed early or the worker is diagnosed late.
Provided that the worker is diagnosed late, if the worker consumes alcohol, then the worker does not perform their job.

Whenever the company intervenes, then under the condition that it is not the case that if the worker does not have a disease then the worker does not perform their job, the worker's job performance is not good.
The company intervenes or the worker intervenes themselves.

If it is not the case that either there is no intervention for the worker or if the worker intervenes themselves, then under the condition that it is not the case that if the worker does not have a disease then the worker does not perform their job, the worker's job performance is not good, then the worker loses their job.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the worker consumes alcohol, then the worker does not perform their job, the worker undergoes rehabilitation.
Whenever it is not the case that if the worker consumes alcohol, then the worker does not perform their job, the worker does not take medical leave.
If it is not the case that if the worker is diagnosed early, then if the worker consumes alcohol, the worker does not perform their job, then the worker's treatment is effective.
Provided that it is not the case that if the worker is diagnosed early, then if the worker consumes alcohol, the worker does not perform their job, then the worker's treatment is not effective.
